title: Ping 100 all times and Game keep Attempting to Reconnect for no Reason
body:
Hello RIot. 
I dont know if you will ever see this Post but i cant do this any longer.. i keep playing League with 100 ping..on previous patches i had like 80 which is playable. But now the game keeps the high ping and Suddenly Attempting to reconnect. I lost 5 games for that issue.. My point here is that i play on Euw server and i am from Cyprus. Servers are too far away and in our country our internet speed isnt that good enought. I have like 1Mb/s connection. 

We need a server to connect closer to us.. Other players play with 3 ms or 40ms ..i play with 200ms sometimes and in good days i play with 100ms .. Pls do something. You have billions but u cant open a server closer to us so we cant enjoy the game ?.. Please :)

replies.body: Most of the issues that prevent us from opening more servers stem from cost vs efficiency as well as trying to find a physical location to host the server itself. We can still run a few troubleshooting steps to see if we can get you a stronger connection though! Run through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying extra attention to the steps on port forwarding and let me know if that helps at all.
